title: Did this happen "while your television was full of rioting and looting? '
subtitle: Mimi suggested that all kinds of legal political news took place in early June 2020 in the midst of unrelated State-level protests about the police.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Mimi mentions the political legal events that took place during the first week of June 2020, while there were nationwide protests against the death of George Floyd.
